steps.title: Clone the repository
steps.description: Clone the walkthrough-kit repository and navigate to the project directory.

steps.title: Install dependencies
steps.description: Install all dependencies using pnpm package manager for this monorepo.

steps.title: Build all packages
steps.description: Build the CLI, parser, and component packages to compile everything.

steps.title: Initialize in your project (optional)
steps.description: Copy the component library to your own project directory.
steps.notes: This will prompt you for directories and copy the component files.

steps.title: Test the CLI
steps.description: Test the CLI by generating a JSON walkthrough from the example markdown file.

steps.title: Run the demo
steps.description: Start the demo application to see the interactive walkthrough component in action.

code.content:
cd demo
npm install
npm run dev

steps.notes: Open your browser to see the interactive walkthrough component.
